backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining user profiles, transactions, payment requests, messaging, blocking logic, and suspicious activity detection with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata listing menu‑related frontend changes, affected files, and associated feature IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining global OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/ic-config.json: Empty configuration file placeholder for IC frontend settings.
frontend/PUBLISHING.md: Guide explaining steps and prerequisites for deploying the app to Internet Computer mainnet.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React component handling session gating and rendering login or main app with React Query provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/ThirdPartyA: Empty dialog placeholder for unavailable third‑party auth.
frontend/src/components/connection/Backe: Stub returning null indicating no backend configuration banner.
Stub returning null for backend reachability banner.
frontend/src/components/connection/Confi: Stub returning null for config initialization banner.
frontend/src/components/connection/Offli: Stub returning null for offline‑mode notice.
frontend/src/components/header/HeaderAut: Stub returning null for header auth status UI.
frontend/src/components/header/HeaderBal: Header coin balance display using useGetCoinBalance with formatted output.
frontend/src/components/nav/HamburgerMen: Hamburger slide‑out menu letting users navigate between dashboard, withdrawal, history, admin, and funds transaction history sections.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/AddFun: Modal handling UPI payment flow, file upload validation, and submitting add-funds requests with receipt upload progress.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/CoinCo: Displays animated coin balance using count-up effect and formatted output.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/Connec: Placeholder component returning null for connection settings.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/CtrCon: Placeholder component returning null for CTR connection.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/FaceVe: Placeholder component returning null for face verification.
Exports scan-earn components for module aggregation.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/Reward: Displays reward tiers, ROI, and allows selecting a funds package.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/Wallet: Shows wallet overview, balance, add-funds button, and withdrawal panel.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/Withdr: Handles coin withdrawal with quick amounts, validation, and submitting transactions.
frontend/src/components/sections/ActiveS: Renders the active UI section based on global flow state.
frontend/src/components/sections/AdminPa: Admin dashboard supporting authentication, user management, payment approvals, blocking, and message replies.
frontend/src/components/sections/Custome: Implements a customer support chat UI that loads messages from the backend and allows authenticated users to send new ones.
frontend/src/components/sections/FundsHi: Displays a page wrapper for viewing the user's add‑funds transaction history via AddFundsHistoryList.
frontend/src/components/sections/Landing: Renders the homepage with hero text, a live trading graphic, CTAs, and feature cards, updating app flow state on button actions.
frontend/src/components/sections/StocksF: Shows the reward calculator and conditionally displays a modal for adding funds based on the selected tier.
frontend/src/components/sections/Winning: Presents a card indicating that no winning history exists yet for the user.
frontend/src/components/sections/Withdra: Wraps and displays the user’s withdrawal history using WithdrawalHistoryList.
Provides a withdrawal UI section that displays the WithdrawalPanel.
frontend/src/components/securepanel/Requ: Guards children components by checking session validity and rendering a fallback when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/securepanel/Secu: Shows the user's session ID and provides a logout button that clears session data and resets app state.
frontend/src/components/trading/HighLowT: Displays a live‑updating simulated trading chart with high/low indicators and current movement stats.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Add: Fetches and displays add‑funds transactions in a table with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Wit: Fetches and shows withdrawal transactions with appropriate loading, error, and empty handling.
frontend/src/config/icEnv.ts: Defines and caches static Internet Computer environment configuration with helper accessors.
frontend/src/config/rewardTiers.ts: Defines a RewardTier interface and a constant list mapping INR amounts to coin rewards.
frontend/src/config/upi.ts: Provides UPI configuration and a helper to build UPI payment URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorResilient.ts: Creates a resilient anonymous actor with retry logic and exposes its loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReachabilit: Checks backend reachability by calling a lightweight actor method with timeout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlinkDetection.ts: Detects blinks from a video element using brightness-based eye openness estimation and tracks blink count.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountUp.ts: Animates a number smoothly toward a target value using an ease‑out curve.
frontend/src/hooks/useInitializationTime: Tracks whether an initialization process has exceeded a timeout and provides a reset function.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, loading, login, and logout using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend queries and mutations for user profiles, balances, funds, withdrawals, and messages with react‑query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSimulatedTradingSe: Generates a bounded random‑walk time series that updates at a fixed interval for simulated trading data.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpoofHeuristics.ts: React hook that analyzes video frame variance over time to flag low‑motion spoofing and manage detection state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom OKLCH theme variables, dark mode tokens, and utility classes like glass and elevation.
frontend/src/lib/connectionDiagnostics.t: Empty placeholder file for connection diagnostics utilities.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Formatting helpers for INR amounts, coin numbers, and digit‑only string extraction.
frontend/src/lib/icErrorParser.ts: Parses IC/agent errors into a structured model with flags for common failure types and extracted metadata.
frontend/src/lib/plkAllowlist.ts: Contains a fixed allowlist of 20 PLK codes and a function to validate a provided code.
frontend/src/lib/plkSession.ts: Manages an 8‑digit numeric session ID with generation, storage, validation, and clearing helpers.
frontend/src/lib/sessionUserId.ts: Generates a cryptographically random user ID in the format USER‑XXXXXXXX.
frontend/src/lib/supportedLogin.ts: Empty placeholder file for supported login logic.
frontend/src/lib/supportEmail.ts: Builds Gmail and mailto URLs and opens a prefilled support email with fallback handling.
frontend/src/lib/useHashRoute.ts: Empty placeholder file for hash‑based routing logic.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a cn() helper merging clsx and tailwind‑merge for className composition.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point mounting React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/SecureAccessGateway.t: Login page that validates a 6‑digit PLK code, manages session creation, and handles email request fallback.
Empty placeholder file for a secure panel dashboard page.
frontend/src/pages/StocksHomePage.tsx: Home page layout with header, navigation, balance indicator, main section view, and footer branding.
frontend/src/state/flowStore.ts: Zustand store managing selected tier and active section with sessionStorage persistence and a reset function.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read, store, persist, and clear URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Empty placeholder file for WhatsApp-related utilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, keyframes, and container settings with plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Project state describing menu consolidation requirements, navigation wiring, and naming consistency for Funds Transaction History.
